src:
Denis pristal med nogami znane Slovenke
Gostov so se nekateri razveselili, drugi pa so živčni, saj ne vedo, kaj jih čaka.
07 Nov 2019, 06:59 by A. L.
Luki je skrivna naloga spodletela. Denisa bi moral prepričati, naj ga ne izbere za dvobojevalca, a je ta storil ravno to, ker je imel občutek, da je Lukova naloga biti neizbran.»Bolj sem bil šokiran, da naloge nisem opravil, kot da sem drugi dvobojevalec. Ker mislim, da imam kar dobre možnosti v areni,« je priznal 20-letnik, ki se sicer zaveda, da arena slej kot prej čaka vsakega od njih.Denis je vmes razmišljal, da bi bilo morebiti bolje izbrati Toma, a je po temeljitem premisleku sklenil, da se mu zdi Luka najlažje premagljiv. Ali bo res tako, bomo videli v areni.Vsekakor ima Luka vsega dovolj: »Zdaj pa začnem igrati, zdaj bom sam hinavec in me boli k****, res!« Dodal je: »Ful mi grejo na k**** ti njihovi obrazi. Vsakič je drugače. Vsi nekaj 'špilajo' in zgleda, da nisem dovolj dober v tej igri. In mi gre res vse na k****.«Medtem so se iz hišice v gozdu na posestvo preselili gostje Sabina, Denis (Toplak) in Miha. Prve se je najbolj razveselil dvojček Jan. Skočil ji je v naročje, v kamero pa je povedal: »To je nor 'filing'! Sem najbolj srečen zdaj!«Navdušenja nad Denisom ni mogla skriti niti Tanja, ki je noge ovila okoli njegovega pasu. Medtem ko so bili nekateri prišlekov veseli, so se drugi spraševali, kaj sledi. In kaj hitro so izvedeli. Trojica prišlekov je poskrbela med drugim za povezovanje črnih ovc, ki so prejeli namige za rešitev uganke. Danijel se je na vse pretege trudil, da bi si črke izmenjali, a se Denis ni strinjal s tem, saj je pred sestankom črnih ovc našel Danijelove skrite namige in prepisal črke, medtem ko jih je s Tomom izmenjal že prej. Rešitev ima tako praktično že na dlani.
text:
Denis landed between the legs of the famous Slovenian woman
Some are delighted with the guests, while others are nervous about not knowing what awaits them.
07 Nov 2019, 06:59 by A.L.
Luke's secret mission failed. He had to persuade Denisa not to choose him as a duelist, but he did just that because he had the feeling that Luke's job was to be unelected. " Because I think I have pretty good chances in the arena, "admitted the 20-year-old, who is aware that the arena is waiting for each of them sooner than before. Denis, meanwhile, thought it might be better to pick Tom, but after a thorough on reflection, he decided that Luke found it most easily overcome. Whether or not that is true, we will see in the arena. In any case, Luka has enough: "Now I start playing, now I'm going to be a hypocrite myself and it hurts me to ****, really!" * those their faces. Each time is different. Everybody's' cavein '' and it looks like I'm not good enough in this game. And I'm really all about ****. ”Meanwhile, guests Sabina, Denis (Toplak) and Miha moved from the house in the woods to the property. The first to be pleased was the twin Jan. He jumped on her lap and told the camera, "This is crazy 'filing!' I'm happiest now! "Even Tanya, who wrapped her legs around his belt, couldn't hide her excitement. While some arrived were happy, others wondered what was coming next. And what they learned quickly. The three newcomers made sure, among other things, to connect the black sheep, who received clues to solve the puzzle. Daniel tried his best to exchange the letters, but Denis disagreed with this, as he found Daniel's hidden clues before meeting the black sheep and transcribed the letters, while he had exchanged them with Tom before. The solution is already practically in the palm of your hand.
